item.title: Spring Boot, SSL 인증서 만들기
item.description: Key store 생성 $ keytool -genkey -v -keystore sb201.key -alias sb201 -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 3650 Enter keystore password: Re-enter new password: What is your first and last name?
